<title level="1" right="Focus 3" pfs="Standard">[Powerful Inhalation](/Spells.aspx?ID=1054)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Air" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=5" />
<trait label="Druid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=52" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 201 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Area** 10-foot emanation

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Saving Throw** [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Fortitude

</row>

</column>

---

You rapidly draw the air from your surroundings, hoarding it for yourself. Creatures in the area when the spell is cast take 5d6 bludgeoning damage with a basic Fortitude save. A creature that fails its save can't speak above a raspy whisper for 1 round. A creature that critically fails can't speak or use abilities that require it to breathe for 1 round. This prevents it from using effects that require speech, such as casting spells with verbal components, and from using a breath weapon or similar ability.

 Creatures made of air (such as [air elementals](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=41)) attempting a save against this spell get a degree of success one worse than they rolled.

---
**Heightened (+1)** Increase the damage by 2d6.
name: Powerful Inhalation
